data.text: @cclareMDMPH Rofl, you people are batshit crazy. Absolutely braindead. Most of the world doesn't give a shit about masks and vaccines anymore and you still have brainwashed morons afraid of going outside
@ebpetroff @cclareMDMPH Are you serious? Please tell me this is satire.
@drrocketgirl @cclareMDMPH Agree. That way, you will only catch Covid from vaccinated people.

@jballs1908 @cclareMDMPH how come everyone that is openly neurotic about covid has pronouns in their bio?  literally everyone posting how afraid they are in this thread has pronouns. Iâ€™m seeing a pattern.
@drrocketgirl @cclareMDMPH Vaccination status makes zero different with getting infected and transmitting covid.
@DrKateJMiller @cclareMDMPH do vaccines stop infection and transmission now?
@cclareMDMPH @ProfGilbert Because the vaccines do not stop infection nor transmission. how do you not know this?
@JoyHenningsenMD @cclareMDMPH i assume by improperly masked you mean that they had a mask

@cclareMDMPH I traveled over 225K in 2019.  Similar for 5 years prior.

Recalibrated my career, have not taken a flight since 2020.  The first meeting I would have considered ended up being in a hotspot, so I canceled.  Same meeting this year is a 6+ hr flight, so passing again.
